short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Revision 4 makes the switch to manifest version 3 and a new user agent

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows youtube.com/tv with the tv version. This extension does not have any viruses and is tested already. Other people also make similar extension but they have viruses or ads. This one does not have any viruses, tracking or ads. 

For more information and screenshots go to https://kushmittal.us/TVHTU
